promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive basic cat steel-type pokemon wearing a grey crown. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regalith, a a massive basic cat steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Dull Light, Dueling Saber. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "steel" or "Regalith". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, cat-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal feline relic thrives in arid landscapes, basking in the Dull Light while expertly wielding its Dueling Saber in contests of strength.
